name: Greed 2: Forbidden Experiments
description: Play the second part of the thrilling hidden object adventure "Greed"! Help Julia save her sister Sophia, who was abducted many years ago. Find out the sinister plans of the secret cult of the Oracles and stop their forbidden experiments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
